resources.string:
- Please pay attention to the maximum allowed time.
- Please specify a parking time ending notice.
- If you wish, set your usage time manually.
- After the timer set, press the start button.
- For return press back button

(Please note that this function is current restricted to Australia only.) Display all possible on-street and off-street parking bays within a certain radius from your intended destination in Melbourne CBD region.
We utilise Google platform to augment your driving experience by providing turn-by-turn navigation.
Actively look for parking bays that suit your demand for duration of stay by filtering out all other irrelevant parking signs.
Avoid violation of time limit by setting a timer to move your vehicle from the parking side.
Get up-to-date information of vacancy in real-time to support your hunt for a parking space.
Find your parking space fastest way
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

string.name: link
string.a: Check Recommended Arrival Time for this bay
